text: George Shrinks is a Canadian children's animated television series. It is based on the children's book by the author William Joyce. It is co-produced by Nelvana Limited and Jade Animation, it is made in association with PBS. The series started on September 30, 2000 on PBS. ==Content== Because of George's very small size, everyday activities, such as working around the house or playing outside, often become exciting adventures. He mostly uses the Zooper Car to travel. It can change into a submarine or a helicopter. The show has a retro-1940s look, with simple animation and colors. Most of the background music is jazz. ==Characters== * George Shrinks -- George is the main character of the series. George wakes up from a dream to discover he is small. He is voiced by Tracey Moore. * Junior Shrinks -- George's baby brother. Junior helps George with things that are too difficult for him. He is voiced by Robbi Jay Thuet. * Becky Lopez -- George's best friend and neighbor. She goes on many of George's adventures. She is voiced by Bryn McAuley. * Perdita "Mom" Shrinks -- Mom is a sculptor. She is voiced by Kathleen Laskey. * Harold "Dad" Shrinks -- Dad is an inventor and a musician in a jazz band. He makes musical instruments and vehicles.
